participant_1.background:
I enjoy trying new things and my favorite foods are sushi and pizza.
i never eat veggies.
i prefer baseball over football.
I spent a lot of time last year listening to The Muggers and trying to produce music myself.
i am gay but i have not told my parents yet.

participant_2.background:
I'm not always the nicest person because I feel like I'm always being overlooked by my older siblings.
i like to write poetry.
i can read in english and french.
I'm interested in learning more about how to use social media to advertise my business.
I like to play video games to de-stress after a long day of welding.

content.text: How are you today?
Hi, I'm doing okay. How about you?
I'm doing great, thanks for asking! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to write poetry and play video games. What about you?
I like to listen to music and try new things.
What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like all kinds of music, but my favorite is probably rock.
What are some of your favorite rock bands?
I like The Muggers, The Clash, and The Beatles.
I've never heard of The Muggers, but I like The Clash and The Beatles too!
The Muggers are a pretty new band, but they're really good. You should check them out.
I will, thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! What do you like to do for work?
I'm a welder. It's a lot of hard work, but I enjoy it.
That's cool! I've always been interested in welding, but I've never had the chance to try it.
It's a lot of fun, but it can be dangerous if you're not careful.
I can imagine. Do you have any plans for the weekend?
I'm going to play video games and write some poetry.
Sounds like a good way to relax. I'm going to go see a movie with some friends.
Have fun!
Thanks! You too!
